name: Tall Grass
description:
Tall Grass - In which you get only one monster and you're totally fine with that. 

You live in a world full of cute wild animals, ready to be encaged in high-tech pocket balls after a good beating. You gotta catch them all, says the TV, you gotta be a duel master.

But your personal urges are different. You just want to have one true good friend. Someone to play ball with and adventure into the forest.

Tall Grass is a tiny fable of cute monsters, friendship and football, made with PuzzleScript for Ludum Dare 28. This is also a little personal homage to Pokemon, our old childhood friend. Hope you like it!

Controls - Arrows to move, X to play, R to restart level.
